game.name: Crown Wars: The Black Prince
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 왕관의 전쟁은 계속하여 맹위를 떨칩니다. 만천하에서 기사들과 도적들이 맹위를 떨치며 파멸의 씨앗을 심습니다. 턴제 기반 전략 및 전술 게임에서 성을 기반으로 세력을 일으켜 삼아 악의 세력과 맞서 전투를 이끄는 군주가 되어 보세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The War of Crowns rages on. Knights and brigands run rampant throughout the land, sowing destruction. From your castle base, rise to become the lord who leads the battle against the forces of evil in this turn-based tactics and strategy game.

reviewHighlights.text: This game seems as unhurtful at first, but have no doubt - it is total crap. It is blend to the point that it becomes unbearable. There is zero plot,...
It is an okay turn-based tacticals game I guess. Not worth $40, but it might be worth it getting it on a sale, which currently is on till 23rd October...
